title: 209: Switching Partners + Bachelor Threesomes + BTS Fights + More!
itunes:title: 209: Switching Partners + Bachelor Threesomes + BTS Fights + More!
description:
In this special “Ask Us Anything” episode, The Broads answer questions that the #broadsquad sent in - and of course it gets a little unhinged. First they chat about bugs for the first 10 minutes (#tangentialbroads are back), and then they dive into questions like “Which #bach member would Evan/Gray fall for?”, “Who would you want to have a threesome with from Bachelor Nation?”, “What would it be like if you switched partners?”, “Have you ever been attracted to each other?”, “What annoys you the most about the other?”, “Do you ever fight?”, “Are you currently exploring non-monogamy?”, and a whole lot more!


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS: 

***TALKSPACE: Use the code CHATTY at talkspace.com to get $100 off your first month!

***HELLO FRESH:Go to HelloFresh.com/80chatty and use code 80chatty to get $80 off including free shipping!

***KIWICO: Get 50% off your first month plus FREE shipping on ANY crate line with code CHATTY at kiwico.com

***FIGHTCAMP: Get free shipping and a gift valued up to $109 with your purchase at JoinFightCamp.com/CHATTY


FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/
